body_html:
Ok, so I think what I'll do then is:

  1. Make argmin/argmax a proper part of the Python API with documentation, so we can include it in the next release,
  2. Use SKIP_PYTHON_BINDINGS for min_values/max_values and,
  3. Create an issue to implement the unified min/max function.
body_text:
Ok, so I think what I'll do then is:

Make argmin/argmax a proper part of the Python API with documentation, so we can include it in the next release,
Use SKIP_PYTHON_BINDINGS for min_values/max_values and,
Create an issue to implement the unified min/max function.
body:
Ok, so I think what I'll do then is:
1. Make `argmin`/`argmax` a proper part of the Python API with documentation, so we can include it in the next release,
2. Use `SKIP_PYTHON_BINDINGS` for `min_values`/`max_values` and,
3. Create an issue to implement the unified min/max function.
